targets.query: SELECT mean("forecast") FROM "prediction" WHERE ("pid" =~ /^$Pid$/ AND "time" > now() AND "type" != 'est_demand' AND "type" != 'est_pv' AND "type" != 'est_wind' and "quality" = 'actual') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "description" fill(null)

SELECT SUM(mean_forecast) FROM (SELECT mean("forecast") as mean_forecast FROM "prediction" WHERE ("pid" =~ /^$Pid$/ AND "time" > now()AND "type" != 'est_demand' AND "type" != 'est_pv' AND "type" != 'est_wind' and "quality" = 'actual') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM(mean_output) FROM 
    (SELECT mean("output") as mean_output FROM "power" WHERE ("system" =~ /^($Systems)$/ and "system" !~ /^$PolarityFlippedSystems$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "system") ,
    (SELECT mean("output")*-1 as mean_output FROM "power" WHERE ("system" =~ /^($Systems)$/ and "system" =~ /^$PolarityFlippedSystems$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "system")
WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("forecast") FROM "prediction" WHERE ("pid" =~ /^$Pid$/ AND "time" > now() AND "type" != 'est_demand' AND "type" != 'est_pv' AND "type" != 'est_wind' and "quality" != 'actual') AND $timeFilter AND time>now()+2d GROUP BY time($__interval), "description" fill(null)

SELECT SUM(mean_forecast) FROM (SELECT mean("forecast") as mean_forecast FROM "prediction" WHERE ("pid" =~ /^$Pid$/ AND "time" > now()AND "type" != 'est_demand' AND "type" != 'est_pv' AND "type" != 'est_wind' and "quality" != 'actual') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), description) WHERE $timeFilter AND time>now()+2d GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("output")*-1 FROM "power" WHERE ("system" =~ /^($Systems)$/ and "system" =~ /^$PolarityFlippedSystems$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "system" fill(null)
SELECT mean("output") FROM "power" WHERE ("system" =~ /^($Systems)$/ and "system" !~ /^$PolarityFlippedSystems$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "system" fill(null)

panels.description: Location of the station, determined by the coordinates of one of the systems.
panels.title: Location $lat, $lon - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

panels.description: Forecast and Confidence. Confidences in the past are of $SpecifcTAhead

targets.query:
SELECT SUM(mean_output) FROM 
    (SELECT mean("output") as mean_output FROM "power" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$Systems$/ and "system" !~ /^$PolarityFlippedSystems$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "system") ,
    (SELECT mean("output")*-1 as mean_output FROM "power" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$Systems$/ and "system" =~ /^$PolarityFlippedSystems$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "system")
WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("forecast") FROM "prediction_tAheads" WHERE ("pid" =~ /^$Pid$/ AND "type" != 'est_demand' AND "type" != 'est_pv' AND "type" != 'est_wind') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tAhead" fill(null)

SELECT mean("forecast") + $Sigma * mean("stdev") AS "Confidence", mean("forecast") - $Sigma * mean("stdev") AS "Lower bound", mean("forecast") as "Latest Forecast" FROM "prediction" WHERE ("pid" =~ /^$Pid$/ AND time > now() AND "type" != 'est_demand' AND "type" != 'est_pv' AND "type" != 'est_wind' AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("forecast")+ $Sigma * mean("stdev") as "Confidence_hist", mean("forecast") -  $Sigma * mean("stdev") as "Lowerbound_hist" FROM "prediction_tAheads" WHERE ("pid" =~ /^$Pid$/ AND "type" != 'est_demand' AND "type" != 'est_pv' AND "type" != 'est_wind' ) AND $timeFilter AND time < NOW() AND "tAhead" =~ /^$SpecifcTAhead$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "tAhead" fill(null)

panels.title: Forecast and Realised - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

panels.description:
Actual - all data for an accurate forecast is present
Calculated - not all input data was available; a conservative forecast is delivered
Not_renewed - A major exception occured; the forecast is based on the load of one week earlier
panels.title: Forecast quality

panels.description: Relatieve gewichten van het getrainde model. Het oppervlak geeft de *gain* aan, de kleur de _occurence_

options.content: <iframe width="100%" height="270" id="gmap_canvas" src="https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/weight_plot.html" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

panels.title: Feature importance - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

panels.description: If the prediction is used for TenneT, an EAN is included. Otherwise (usually) not.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created AS "time",
  ean
FROM predictions
WHERE
  id = $Pid
ORDER BY created

panels.title: EAN (if any)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  apiKey
FROM customersApiKeys
WHERE
  name = '$Prediction_name'
ORDER BY apiKey

options.content: <iframe width="100%" height="300" id="gmap_canvas" src="https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/Predictor0.25.html" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

<iframe width="100%" height="300" id="gmap_canvas" src="https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/Predictor47.0.html" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

<script>
$(function() {
    $.ajax({
        url: "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/capacity/capacity_prognoses.html",
        dataType: "jsonp",
        timeout: 5000,

        success: function () {
            $("#iframe-capacity").attr("src", "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/capacity/capacity_prognoses.html");
        },
        error: function (parsedjson) {
            if(parsedjson.status == "200") {
                $("#iframe-capacity").attr("src", "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/capacity/capacity_prognoses.html");
            } else {
                $("#iframe-capacity").attr("src", "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/favicon.ico");
            }
        }
    });
});
</script>
<iframe width="100%" height="300" id="iframe-capacity" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

panels.description: Hyper parameters for the given prediction.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  hpv.created,
  names.name, 
  hpv.value
FROM hyper_param_values hpv 
INNER JOIN hyper_params names ON names.id = hpv.hyper_params_id 
INNER JOIN predictions p ON p.id = hpv.prediction_id
WHERE p.id in ($Pid) AND hpv.created = (SELECT max(created) FROM hyper_param_values WHERE prediction_id = ($Pid))

panels.title: Hyperparams - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

panels.description: Overview of the energy split coefficients for the given prediction.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created,
  coef_name,
  coef_value
FROM energy_split_coefs
WHERE
  pid = $Pid AND created = (SELECT max(created) from energy_split_coefs WHERE pid =$Pid) ORDER BY coef_name DESC

panels.title: Energy split coefficients - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

panels.description: Split components for the given prediction. The forecast is the sum of all components.
panels.title: Split components - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

options.content:
<script>
$(function() {
    $.ajax({
        url: "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/stations_detection.html",
        dataType: "jsonp",
        timeout: 5000,

        success: function () {
            $("#iframe").attr("src", "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/stations_detection.html");
        },
        error: function (parsedjson) {
            if(parsedjson.status == "200") {
                $("#iframe").attr("src", "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/trained_models/$Pid/stations_detection.html");
            } else {
                $("#iframe").attr("src", "https://dashboard.icarus.energy/favicon.ico");
            }
        }
    });
});
</script>
<iframe width="100%" height="300" id="iframe" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

list.name: Sigma
list.query: select case $Confidence when 98 then 2 when 66 then 1 when 0 then 0 end as sigma

list.definition: select s.sid from systems s left join predictions_systems ps on ps.system_id = s.sid left join  predictions p on ps.prediction_id = p.id where p.id='$Pid'
